content: Pok Pok is a popular restaurant in Portland, Oregon that serves authentic Thai cuisine. The restaurant's menu is inspired by the bold and complex flavors of Thailand, and many of the dishes are traditional street foods or comfort foods. Some of the most popular dishes at Pok Pok include the famous Fish Sauce Wings, Papaya Salad, Khao Soi, and Issan-style sausages. They offer a unique taste of Thai cuisine that you won't find anywhere else in Portland.
